name: Hemoglobin Project [DD13 Demo]
description:
V.002 UPDATE -

Fixed a game-breaking display bug when ALT+ENTER switching to windowed mode, as well as a game-breaking bug that would sometimes occur when going through doors.

Hemoglobin Project is a 2D survival horror game, with a focus on methodical combat and exploration of the environment. You'll need to be on your toes to find the clues you need to escape from this nightmare.

THIS GAME IS IN VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT

Some bugs may be encountered. If you encounter an issue, it would help me greatly if you could send a screencap and a brief description of the issue to jasozzdesign@gmail.com

I hope you enjoy the demo!

HAVING TROUBLE? CHECK OUT THE WALKTHROUGH
